backend/main.mo: Actor with access control and blob storage mixins managing user profiles, allowing users or admins to view and update profiles.
backend/migration.mo: Defines legacy types and provides a migration function that clears old voice model and job data.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining warm OKLCH color tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Simple HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with theme provider and toaster.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Page layout wrapper with navigation, main container, and footer.
frontend/src/components/AppNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with links, icons, and login button for desktop and mobile.
frontend/src/components/AudioUploadAndSu: Form for selecting a voice model, uploading audio, tracking progress, and creating a conversion job.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Authentication gate that shows a sign‑in prompt until the user is logged in.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Renders the static RVC Covers logo image.
frontend/src/components/EmptyStateHero.t: Reusable empty‑state component with optional illustration and action button.
frontend/src/components/InlineAlert.tsx: Inline alert component showing variant‑based icons and messages.
frontend/src/components/JobsTable.tsx: Fetches and displays the user’s conversion jobs in a grid, showing loading placeholders and sorting jobs by creation time.
frontend/src/components/JobStatusCard.ts: Displays a card showing a conversion job’s status, timestamps, and a disabled download button since backend functionality is removed.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and error handling.
frontend/src/components/ModelSelect.tsx: Renders a dropdown of available voice models with loading and empty states.
Lists user voice models with metadata, creation date, and a delete confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/VoiceModelUpload: Form for uploading a new voice model with fields, validation, progress tracking, and submit handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useConversionJobs.ts: Provides hooks for listing, fetching, and creating conversion jobs, currently returning stubs due to removed backend functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout handling, and provides identity context to the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useModelNameLookup.ts: Provides a lookup function that returns a voice model’s name by ID using fetched models, defaulting to 'Unknown Model'.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoiceModels.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching, uploading, and deleting voice models, with upload/delete currently stubbed out due to missing backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and defines light/dark theme CSS variables and global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/CreateCoverPage.tsx: Renders the AI cover creation page, showing an upload component if models exist or an empty state prompting model upload.
frontend/src/pages/JobsHistoryPage.tsx: Displays a user’s conversion job history or an empty state prompting them to create their first cover.
frontend/src/pages/VoiceModelsPage.tsx: Shows the voice models management page with upload form and list, or an empty state when no models exist.
Downloads an ExternalBlob as an audio file by creating a temporary object URL and triggering a browser download.
frontend/src/utils/fileToBytes.ts: Converts a File to a Uint8Array with size validation and FileReader handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, custom colors, typography, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, requirements, architecture notes, and overall app purpose.
